SELECT F.FEED_ID, F.CONTENT, F.CREATED_AT, F.CREATED_BY AS WRITER_ID, M.NICKNAME AS WRITER_NICKNAME, M.PROFILE_PATH AS WRITER_PROFILE_PATH, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FEED_COMMENT FC WHERE FC.FEED_ID = F.FEED_ID ) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM FEED F JOIN MEMBER M ON F.CREATED_BY = M.MEMBER_ID
F.CREATED_BY != #{memberId}
F.CREATED_BY IN ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM CREW_MEMBER WHERE CREW_ID IN ( SELECT CREW_ID FROM CREW_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ))
F.CREATED_BY = #{memberId}
ORDER BY F.CREATED_AT DESC
ORDER BY F.CREATED_AT ASC
ORDER BY M.NICKNAME ASC
ORDER BY M.NICKNAME DESC
ORDER BY ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FEED_LIKE FL WHERE FL.FEED_ID = F.FEED_ID ) DESC
ORDER BY COMMENT_COUNT DESC
OFFSET #{page} * #{perPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{perPage} ROWS ONLY
